√vam 'vomit'

present: [2.] vámiti  vamanti etc. V.+  avamīt  vamat B.+   -- [1.] vamati etc. E.+  

perfect: vavāma E.+  vemus  vavamus  uvāma  

aorist: [1.] avāmi   -- [3.] avīvamat   -- [4.] avān   -- [5.] avamīt  

[future: vamiṣyati  vamitā  ]

verbal: vāṃtá B.+  vamitvā  

secondary: intensive: vaṅvam-   -- desiderative: vivamiṣa-   -- causative: vāmayati etc.  vamayati etc.  

derivatives: vami  vāmin B.+  vamana C.  vāmanīya C.  vamitavya C.  vamathu C.  vamrá? V.B.
